sketch.compiler.ast.spmd.stmts

Class StmtSpmdfork

  • java.lang.Object
    • sketch.compiler.ast.core.FENode
      • sketch.compiler.ast.core.stmts.Statement
        • sketch.compiler.ast.spmd.stmts.StmtSpmdfork

  • public class StmtSpmdfork
extends Statement
    The "Spmdfork(N) stmt" statement that forks N processes executing the same statement. Used in SPMD program.
    Author:
    tim
